solution_line_template: After this summer, she will have twice as many posters as when she had {posters_two_years_ago}, so she will have C + {posters_added_summer} = {double_factor} * {posters_two_years_ago} = {posters_after_summer} posters.
Thus, Cassidy has C = {posters_after_summer} - {posters_added_summer} = <<{posters_after_summer}-{posters_added_summer}={current_posters}>>{current_posters} posters now.
